text: For 2 pax at this price, I think is reasonable. Ordered mala soup medium spicy and it was very tasty. Next time will try the dry version.

Instant noodle overcooked.
Portioning good. If running out of meat from the selection counter, can request from cashier for more meat. They will weight it.
Price reasonable.
Tasty but a little oily.
Unfortunately the mala here wasn’t great at all. 中辣 was barely spicy, not fragrant, food was soggy, and above all, it was pricey.
